tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive WHOIS information for a domain including registrant details, registration dates, nameservers, and registrar information.

domain_name.description: Domain name to query for WHOIS information

include_history.description: Include historical WHOIS data if available

error_messages: Invalid domain format: Domain name must be a valid fully qualified domain name.
Domain not found: The specified domain is not registered or does not exist.
WHOIS service unavailable: The WHOIS service for this TLD is temporarily unavailable.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many WHOIS queries have been made in a short period.
usage: Provide a domain name to retrieve its WHOIS information. Set include_history to true if you need historical registration data. The tool returns comprehensive registration details.

privacy_protected.description: Whether WHOIS privacy protection is enabled
